descriptionHtml:
While i love using AEterna Circlets Improvement by aeterna826, I  never like the stones, then i found Circlet Jewel Replacer by Verbal Warmother wich i love the jewels but the moonstone was not really my favorite, so i decided to make my own ....

Edit: Now thank you to  Porcelyn who make the normal map and greyscale the stones looks even more beautyfull 

I keep the black pearl from the remplacer of verbal warmother, but change  the ruby, emerald, sapphire and moonstone, (i actually use a picture from a real moonstone

 to intall go to ...\\Data\\textures\\armor\\circlets. and replace (best if use with AEterna Circlets, because is how im using it =P)

Again this is only the stones replacer if you whant AEtarna Circlets please go to http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=1994

Credits go to aeterna826 and Verbal Warmother because i got inspired by theys work
author: VenusM
